node.title: Instaclustr
node.content:
News

Friday 1st December 2017 by Ben Slater

 Instaclustr offers managed and supported solutions for a wide range of open source technologies including Apache Cassandra, ScyllaDB, Elasticsearch, Apache Spark, Apache Zeppelin, Kibana and Apache Lucene.  CPO Ben Slater provides their 7-step guide...
